snippet: William M. Daley will be replaced by Jacob J. Lew, the budget director and a seasoned Washington insider, jolting the top ranks of President Obama’s administration in an election year.
abstract: Pres Obama announces that White House Chief of Staff William M Daley is stepping down, to be replaced by Jacob J Lew, White House budget director and seasoned Washington insider with ties to Capitol Hill; announcement jolts the top ranks of the Obama administration, less than a year before he faces a difficult re-election.
lead_paragraph: William M. Daley will be replaced by Jacob J. Lew, the budget director and a seasoned Washington insider, jolting the top ranks of President Obama’s administration in an election year.

headline.main: Daley Stepping Down in Rare White House Shake-Up
headline.print_headline: Daley Will Leave The White House In Rare Shake-Up
